subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Marlins knocked around Bartolo Colon and Tyler Clippard, and the rookie Adam Conley helped keep the Mets scoreless as they lost a game off their division lead over the Nationals.
snippet: The Marlins knocked around Bartolo Colon and Tyler Clippard, and the rookie Adam Conley helped keep the Mets scoreless as they lost a game off their division lead over the Nationals.
